name: EW6.MessageBubbles
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Applies in both Messages.app and WhatsApp.

Only themes the SHAPE of the bubbles. Coloring is done by other tweaks, e.g. DopeConvos / ColorizeChat, Nord etc.

Apply with iThemer / Snowboard (with UI extension). Installed to /Library/Themes

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet

1.1-1: Changed default colour of WhatsApp bubbles to grey & dark green
1.1: Added compatibility of “Outline Bubbles” option in DopeConvos
